company.taskMan.task

Interface Dependant

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingTask, DelegatingTaskProxy, DelegationProject, Project, Task

    public interface Dependant
    This interface determines all methods required in an observer pattern for the OBSERVER part. Both projects and tasks implement this interface. Tasks can be dependant of other tasks (prerequisite tasks), projects are dependant of tasks (a project can only be finished when it has at least one task and all tasks are finished or have a finished alternative).
    Author:
    Tim Van Den Broecke, Joran Van de Woestijne, Vincent Van Gestel and Eli Vangrieken

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimeSpan getMaxDelayChain()
      Get the longest possible duration that a series of dependants (this one and its dependants) could require to finish (estimated)
      void updateDependencyFinished(Task preTask)
      Update dependency of this Dependant on preTask.

      • updateDependencyFinished

        void updateDependencyFinished(Task preTask)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Update dependency of this Dependant on preTask.
        Parameters:
        preTask - | The prerequisite that has changed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - | if preTask isn't a Dependant

      • getMaxDelayChain

        TimeSpan getMaxDelayChain()
        Get the longest possible duration that a series of dependants (this one and its dependants) could require to finish (estimated)
        Returns:
        the longest possible duration as a TimeSpan for this dependant and its dependants to finish (estimated)
